text: A National drink is a distinct beverage that is strongly associated with a particular country, and can be part of their national identity and self-image. ==National dishes== Country Common name Picture Reference Tea Caesar (cocktail) Lassi Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations Collection 2, Episode 5; Final Segment. Sugarcane juice Arak (drink) Dictionary definition: arak. (n.d.) American Heritage Dictionary of the English Language, Fifth Edition. (2011). Retrieved 10 March 2016. title: List of national drinks
